name: Air Grandpas
description:
CONTROLS: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON ON GRANDPA  BOOSTS HIM UP. DON'T LET GRANDPA FALL

Oh God, Grandpa is drunk and in air. Again.

Send this old man to space for whatever reason, I don't know, be creative.

Is sending Grandpa to space a good idea? Well, probably not, but better listen to your wife.

30 minutes well spent
